scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build-amd && npm run build-umd && npm run build-global
scripts.build-amd: node_modules/.bin/rollup src/phoenix.js | node_modules/.bin/babel -m amd --module-id phoenix_js -o dist/phoenix.amd.js
scripts.build-umd: node_modules/.bin/rollup src/phoenix.js | node_modules/.bin/babel -m umd --module-id phoenix_js -o dist/phoenix.umd.js
scripts.build-global: node_modules/.bin/rollup src/phoenix.js | node_modules/.bin/babel -m umd --module-id Phoenix -o dist/phoenix.js
